712390.name: Team Four Star RPG
712390.description:
A comedy RPG inspired by Team Four Star.

Join Lanipator, Master Wugglez, and LordMoonStone. Also known as Nick, Grant and Kirran, as they venture through worlds based on games they once played. Help them as they try to return back to their home.

Gameplay features includes turn-based battles, light hearted writing, and appearances by other Team Four Star members, and Fans.

Re-visit worlds the TFS crew had once tread, including a post-apocalyptic world, a modern society, and a martial arts anime.

Buy new allies with contracts and unlock their quests to unleash more of their power.

Funny writing made sure to make you chuckle at least a couple of times.
